government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "change the law and make Polygraph testing mandatory when an accusation of abuse is made by a child against an adult to prove the innocence of the wrongly accused, or the guilt. We also want the polygraph results made admissible in a court of law."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15767.asp

Prime Minister's Office
